pages.text: This place can really mess with your head if you're not cautious. If you're careful and take good care of yourself, you might be okay, but you have to $(#00a800)watch your sanity$(). If you dip too low, $(d)monsters can sense it$(), and they'll attack you even if you're holding a lantern or camera.

Take a break when you need itâ€”grab some $(#00a8a8)tea$(), get plenty of $(#00a800)sleep$(), or get a hobby - $(#00a800)gardening and fishing$() are good ideas.$(br2)Keep your sanity in check, because if you let the darkness in, things can get bad real quick.
